BugInstance.message: Class org.apache.shardingsphere.dialect.mysql.exception.HandshakeException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.dialect.mysql.exception.UnknownCharsetException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.dialect.mysql.exception.UnknownCollationException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Class org.apache.shardingsphere.dialect.mysql.exception.UnsupportedPreparedStatementException defines a computed serialVersionUID that doesn't equate to the calculated value
Method org.apache.shardingsphere.dialect.mysql.mapper.MySQLDialectExceptionMapper.convert(SQLDialectException) uses instanceof on multiple types to arbitrate logic
